SELECT sum(ifnull(vcra.contract_amount_tax_local,co.contract_amount_tax_local)) as budget_amount FROM contract_object co INNER JOIN contract_base cb ON co.contract_id = cb.id INNER JOIN bas_material bm on co.prod_code = bm.code INNER JOIN project_bom_relation pbr ON bm.id = pbr.material_id AND pbr.del_flag = '0' AND pbr.proj_id = cb.project_id left join view_contract_record_amount vcra on co.id = vcra.record_id WHERE co.del_flag = '0' AND cb.contract_status = '4' AND cb.main_id is null
AND cb.project_id = #{query.projectId}

SELECT sum(co.contract_amount_tax_local) as budget_amount FROM contract_object co INNER JOIN contract_base cb ON co.contract_id = cb.id left join bidding_record br on co.to_record_id = br.id left join inquiry_record ir on co.to_record_id = ir.id inner join purchase_request_detail prd on ifnull(br.to_record_id,ir.to_record_id) = prd.id INNER JOIN project_bom_relation pbr ON prd.prod_id = pbr.material_id AND pbr.del_flag = '0' AND pbr.proj_id = cb.project_id INNER JOIN bas_material bm on pbr.material_id = bm.id WHERE co.del_flag = '0' AND cb.contract_status = '4' AND bm.model = #{query.model} AND cb.project_id = #{query.projectId}
